title: Is there any way to recover the applications I had on my Pixel 3 after a factory reset?
content:
I did the factory reset, and only a minimal number of apps were restored.

Also, I lost all of my SMS message, none were restored. According to the documentation I had read, the SMS messages were to be retained.

The frustrating thing is that the factory reset was recommended by Google and Verizon to resolve an issue I had with charging. It did not resolve the issue, and I have to get a new phone anyway, it is just that in the process of this troubleshooting, I lost all of my applications and SMS messages.

A big pain!
